data.name: Beboop to the Rescue!
data.detailed_description:
Help Beboop to fix Robomath Inc. in its 10 floors full of broken robots. This game is targeted to 4th Grade students or above. Use your Math skills to solve the puzzles, fix the robots and get some help from them!
  • Jump through a pile of boxes
  • Be thrown by crazy robots
  • Master your Math skills
data.about_the_game:
Help Beboop to fix Robomath Inc. in its 10 floors full of broken robots. This game is targeted to 4th Grade students or above. Use your Math skills to solve the puzzles, fix the robots and get some help from them!
  • Jump through a pile of boxes
  • Be thrown by crazy robots
  • Master your Math skills
data.short_description: Beboop is a rescue robot built to help other robots in times of need! Help Beboop in this educational puzzle platformer game about Math, with the target audience of 4th Grade or above.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2 gigahertz (GHz) or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 or later
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 55 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2 gigahertz (GHz) or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 or later
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 55 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
